objects.specification: A large rectangular floor plane in a light neutral color with a smooth, matte texture that reduces glare and provides a clean, minimalist foundation for the classroom. The surface is uniformly flat with subtle ambient shading to evoke realistic lighting conditions and a gentle sense of depth.

A broad, smooth wall panel painted in bright off-white with a slight matte finish. It presents a seamless surface with crisp, straight edges and minimal texture, reflecting ambient light softly to maintain a welcoming learning environment.

A flat wall surface with a light neutral paint and smooth finish, extending the length of the back of the classroom. The panel is seamless and uniform, softly diffusing light to create a bright and spacious feel.
A side wall panel finished in pale, neutral white with a subtle matte texture for minimal glare. It has clean lines, a uniform surface, and gentle shading to accentuate the room’s brightness.
A smooth, light-colored wall panel with a seamless finish and crisp edges. The surface is painted in an airy off-white tone, providing a calm backdrop for educational wall elements.

A flat rectangular ceiling panel in a crisp white finish, with a minimal thickness and smooth matte surface. The design is modern and unobtrusive, serving as a neutral canvas for mounted lighting and equipment.

A large rectangular teacher’s desk in a rich dark wood tone with a smooth tabletop surface and gently beveled edges. The legs are sturdy and square, supporting a contemporary yet timeless classroom design that conveys professionalism and warmth.

A comfortable teacher’s chair matching the desk’s dark wood tone, featuring a slightly curved backrest and subtly contoured seat. The legs are sleek and straight, and the finish is polished to emphasize the natural wood grain.

A large rectangular whiteboard with a smooth, matte white writing surface, framed by a thin silver metallic border. Its low-reflective finish minimizes glare under classroom lighting and offers a clean, professional appearance.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector in a neutral white finish, featuring clean geometric lines and a low-profile housing. The lens area is smooth and recessed, emphasizing a modern minimalist aesthetic.
A rectangular window with a sleek light-colored frame and clear glass pane. The design is minimalist and modern, providing unobstructed views and ample natural light.
A matching rectangular window with a slender, modern frame in a light neutral tone. The clear glass offers transparency and contributes to a bright, airy classroom atmosphere.
A simple fabric curtain panel in a soft off-white color, with natural folds and gentle draping. It has a thin header and subtle, realistic texture to convey lightweight, airy material.
An identical fabric curtain in a light neutral tone, hanging with subtle folds and soft drape. The textile appears lightweight and semi-translucent to gently filter incoming daylight.

A tall, narrow bookshelf in a dark wood tone, featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves. Each shelf is filled with varied book spines in muted colors, giving a lived-in educational feel and a sense of depth.
A circular wall clock with a clean white face, simple black hour markers and hands, and a slim metallic frame. The design is minimalist and modern, ensuring clear readability from across the room.
A vibrant educational poster showcasing colorful charts and informative graphics on a white background. It has a thin protective frame and a glossy finish to emphasize clarity and visual appeal.
A matching educational poster with bright infographics and clear typography on a light background. The surface is slightly glossy, and the frame is minimal to keep focus on the content.
A colorful educational chart poster with a slim frame and glossy finish. It features clear diagrams and engaging visuals against a crisp white backdrop.
An educational poster with vibrant colors and clear graphics, protected by a thin glossy frame. The surface is smooth and designed to attract attention.
A decorative potted plant with lush green leaves and a simple round pot. The foliage is dense with varied leaf shapes, conveying freshness and a touch of nature.
A small cylindrical waste bin in dark gray plastic with smooth curved sides and an open top. The finish is matte to avoid glare and blend unobtrusively into the classroom.
An identical dark gray plastic waste bin with a smooth, matte finish and open top. Its simple design ensures functionality without visual clutter.

A compact rectangular student desk in a warm light wood tone with a smooth, flat tabletop and slender straight legs. The edges are slightly rounded for safety, and the finish is matte to reduce glare under classroom lighting.
A simple school chair in a warm light wood tone matching the desk, featuring a gently curved backrest and a flat seat. The legs are straight and slender, with a matte finish to minimize glare.

A simple flush-mounted ceiling light with a circular white diffuser and a thin metallic rim. The fixture emits uniform, bright lighting and has a minimalist modern design that complements the classroom ceiling.
